research expirience.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

courses: Key words of a future PhD thesis: spatiotemporal data prediction & forecasting, natural language processing, computer vision
Thesis: Process Analytics Methods for Anomaly Detection Tasks in System Log Data
